summary: Consume the Kitemaker GraphQL API to interact with organizations, spaces, users, and work items.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (Organization, Space, User, Work Item).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource.

parameters.name: returnAll
parameters.description: Specify whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Provide the title of the work item to create.
